ml:doc-envelope.ml:original-txt:
ï»¿OFFICIAL DOCUMENTS RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Additional Grant (Ebola Emergency Response Project) to the Republic of Guinea The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association extend to the Republic of Guinea (the Recipient) an additional financing in an amount equivalent to SDR 48,800,000. The purpose of said additional financing is to provide additional funds to supplement the financial assistance furnished by the Association under the Financing Agreement (Ebola Emergency Response Project, Grant No. H990-GN), dated September 17, 2014, between Republic of Guinea and the Association. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to extend such additional financing, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the additional financing are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the project in support of which the proceeds of such additional financing are to be applied continues to come within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the economic development of the Republic of Guinea and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the Republic of Guinea. 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that the said Project merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said project for such assistance.
ï»¿Republic of Guinea 2 Additional Financing for Ebola Emergency Response Project COMMITTEE: Senior Vice President and Group General Counsel Nominee selected by Governor for the Republic of Guinea Regional Vice President Africa Dated at Washington, DC
